content.text: Do not change the column headers in Row 1 as this is used to complete the upload.
The table below lists the columns and which columns are required or optional.
Asset ID - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters.
Unique identifier for your asset. This can be alpha, numeric, or combination. Duplicates are not allowed.
Description - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters.
Brief description of the asset. Make sure you use a consistent description to help users search for assets.
Asset Group - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters.
Shows where the asset physically is located or the department/division it belongs to. It helps maintenance know where to go to complete a repair.
Asset Category - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters.
The asset category groups and asset types together to separate and distinguish the log types and custom fields.
We recommend that you do not create a lot of categories.
Asset Type - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters.
The asset type (subcategory).
Example: Heavy Equipment category can have Backhoe, Loader, Excavator asset types with Fuel, Hours, Miles/Kilometers log types.
Example: Vehicles category can have Pickup, Car asset types with Fuel, Miles/Kilometers log types.
Example: Equipment category can have Forklift asset type with Fuel, Hours log types.
Example: Buildings category can have Office, Fire Systems asset types with Not applicable log types.
Example: Facility Equipment category can have Boiler asset type with Temperature log types.
Budget Group - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters.
Default Budget - Required field.
This is the budget which is used to track expenses. Budgets can be Departments, Job Codes, or Operations.
Status - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters.
This is used to determine if the asset is Active or Inactive.
Vendor - Optional field with maximum length of 100 characters.
Unique identifier for a vendor. If the vendor doesn't exist in the system then the new vendor will be uploaded.
Customer - Optional field with maximum length of 100 characters.
Unique identifier for a customer. If the customer doesn't exist in the system then the new vendor will be uploaded.
Make - Optional field.
The make of the asset.
Model - Optional field with maximum length of 32 characters.
The model name or number of the asset.
Year - Optional field with maximum length of 4 characters.
The year the asset was manufactured.
Serial - Optional field with maximum length of 32 characters.
Used for either Serial Number or VIN.
Barcode-Tag - Optional field with maximum length of 50 characters.
Purchase Cost - Optional numeric field.
Cost of the asset when it was purchased.
Purchase Date - Optional date field.
The date the asset was purchased.
In Service Date - Optional date field.
The date of the vehicle was put to use after the purchase.
Useful Life(Months) - Optional numeric field.
Salvage Value - Optional numeric field.
